marunouchi-yusen-building.title: Tokyo Station
marunouchi-yusen-building.description: Tokyo station is a transportation hub that is not only convenient but prestigious
marunouchi-yusen-building.jaDescription: 東京駅は日本最大のターミナルで歴史ある駅舎は重要文化財に指定されています

marunouchi-yusen-building.title: Marunouchi Naka-Dori Street
marunouchi-yusen-building.description: Nakadori features the world's leading luxury select shops
marunouchi-yusen-building.jaDescription: 街路樹が美しい丸の内仲通り沿いには有名ブランドショップが立ち並んでいます

marunouchi-yusen-building.title: Wadakura fountain park
marunouchi-yusen-building.description: Wadakura fountain park was remade to celebrate the royal wedding
marunouchi-yusen-building.jaDescription: 和田倉噴水公園には大噴水のほかに水のモニュメントやレストランがあります

marunouchi-trust-tower-main.title: Marunouchi Business District
marunouchi-trust-tower-main.description: Marunouchi is the center of Japanese business, and home to many corporations
marunouchi-trust-tower-main.jaDescription: 丸の内は日本の金融・経済の中心地で数多くの大手企業が本社を構えています

marunouchi-trust-tower-main.title: Yaechika
marunouchi-trust-tower-main.description: Yaechika, connected to Tokyo station, features countless shops and restaurants
marunouchi-trust-tower-main.jaDescription: 八重洲地下街（ヤエチカ）は都内最大級の商店街で東京駅とも直結しています

marunouchi-trust-tower-main.title: Daimaru Department Store
marunouchi-trust-tower-main.description: Daimaru offers a wide range of shops featuring the latest new trends
marunouchi-trust-tower-main.jaDescription: 大丸東京店には食品からファッション、レストランまで多彩に揃います

otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.title: Otemachi Financial District
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.description: Otemachi is home to the headquarters of many banking, trading, and PR firms
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.jaDescription: 大手町は銀行・商社・マスコミの本社が集積する日本を代表するオフィス街です

otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.title: Otemachi Tower / Aman Tokyo
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.description: Aman's first city hotel, Aman Tokyo, opened its doors in Otemachi Tower
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.jaDescription: アマンリゾート初のシティホテル「アマン東京」が大手町タワーに開業しました

otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.title: Iliad Japan
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.description: Famous art such as Iliad Japan is exhibited at Sankei Building
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.jaTitle: イリアッド・ジャパン
otemachi-tokyo-sankei-building.jaDescription: サンケイビルには「イリアッド・ジャパン」などのアートが展示されています

nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.title: Bank of Japan
nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.description: Bank of Japan is a large pillar in Japanese finance as well as a famous cultural site
nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.jaDescription: 日本銀行本店は辰野金吾により設計され、現在は重要文化財に指定されています

nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.title: Nihonbachi Bridge
nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.description: Nihonbashi bridge, first built in 1603, shows area's rich history
nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.jaDescription: 日本橋には日本の道路元標があり、日本の道路網の始点となっています

nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.title: Nihonbashi Mitsui Tower
nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.description: Nihonbashi Mitsui Tower is home to the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo Hotel
nihonbashi-wakamatsu-building.jaDescription: 日本橋三井タワーにはマンダリン・オリエンタル東京などが入居しています

hibiya-central-building.title: Hibiya Park
hibiya-central-building.description: Hibiya Park is one of Japan's most famous parks and holds various events
hibiya-central-building.jaDescription: 日比谷公園は日本有数の公園で年間を通じて様々なイベントも開催されています

hibiya-central-building.title: National Diet Building
hibiya-central-building.description: Completed in 1936, the National Diet Building houses both the lower and upper houses
hibiya-central-building.jaDescription: 国会議事堂は1936年に竣工、左に衆議院、右に参議院が配置されています

hibiya-central-building.title: Ginza
hibiya-central-building.description: Within walking distance to Ginza, one of Japan's most famous shopping districts
hibiya-central-building.jaDescription: 日本有数の繁華街で高級商業地である「銀座」も徒歩圏内です

tri-seven-roppongi.title: Tokyo Mid town
tri-seven-roppongi.description: Tokyo Midtown is a mixed-used development which boasts having the tallest tower downtown
tri-seven-roppongi.jaDescription: 東京ミッドタウンは複数の施設から構成され、タワーは都内最高層を誇ります

tri-seven-roppongi.title: Midtown Garden
tri-seven-roppongi.description: Midtown Garden is an oasis inside the bustle of downtown
tri-seven-roppongi.jaTitle: ミッドタウンガーデン
tri-seven-roppongi.jaDescription: ミッドタウンガーデンはビジネス街のオアシスとして親しまれています

tri-seven-roppongi.title: Tenso Shrine
tri-seven-roppongi.description: Tenso Shrine is connected to Tri-Seven by a shared plaza rich in greenery
tri-seven-roppongi.jaDescription: 福禄寿を奉る天祖神社に隣接、境内につながる緑豊かな広場を共有しています

shiodome-shibarikyu-building.title: Kyu Shiba Rikyu Garden
shiodome-shibarikyu-building.description: Gaze down at the views of Kyu Shiba Rikyu Garden, a former imperial garden
shiodome-shibarikyu-building.jaDescription: 眼下には旧芝離宮恩賜庭園が広がるほか、浜離宮恩賜庭園からも至近です

shiodome-shibarikyu-building.title: Tokyo Monorail
shiodome-shibarikyu-building.description: Tokyo Monorail provides convenient and direct access to Haneda Airport
shiodome-shibarikyu-building.jaDescription: 最寄の浜松町駅は東京モノレールの始発駅で羽田空港へのアクセスも良好です

shiodome-shibarikyu-building.title: Tokyo bay and Rainbow Bridge
shiodome-shibarikyu-building.description: Gaze out at Tokyo Bay and Rainbow Bridge, some of Japan's most glorious views
shiodome-shibarikyu-building.jaDescription: 眼前に広がる東京湾とレインボーブリッジの夜景を望むことができます

shiroyama-trust-tower.title: Hotel Okura
shiroyama-trust-tower.description: Hotel Okura is a popular spot for dignitaries, celebrities and VIPs
shiroyama-trust-tower.jaDescription: ホテルオークラ東京は世界のVIPも利用する日本を代表するホテルです

shiroyama-trust-tower.title: Ark Hills / Sakurazaka
shiroyama-trust-tower.description: The area around Ark Hills is famous for it's sakura trees and events are held anually
shiroyama-trust-tower.jaDescription: アークヒルズ周辺は桜の名所として有名で毎年イベントが開催されています

shiroyama-trust-tower.title: Embassy of the United States
shiroyama-trust-tower.description: The American Embassy and countless other foreign government offices are gathered here
shiroyama-trust-tower.jaDescription: アメリカ大使館をはじめ、近隣には多くの大使館や在外公館が集積しています

shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.title: Shinagawa Konan business district
shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.description: Recently redeveloped, Shinagawa Konan has become one of Tokyo's leading business areas
shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.jaDescription: 品川港南は近年の再開発によって都内でも有数のビジネス街となりました

shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.title: Shinagawa station
shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.description: Shinagawa Station is popular for its access to Haneda airport and the linear bullet train line
shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.jaDescription: 品川駅は羽田空港へのアクセスも容易でリニア新幹線の始発駅としても話題です

shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.title: Shinkansen
shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.description: The Tokaido Bullet-train line provides access to west Japan as well as the Chubu region
shinagawa-intercity-tower-a.jaDescription: 品川駅は東海道新幹線の停車駅で中部・西日本エリアへの玄関口でもあります

aoyama-palacio-tower.title: Omotesando
aoyama-palacio-tower.description: Created as a path to Meiji Shrine, Ometesando is a breathtaking tree-lined street
aoyama-palacio-tower.jaDescription: 表参道は明治神宮の参道として整備され街路樹のケヤキ並木が美しい通りです

aoyama-palacio-tower.title: Omotesando shopping district
aoyama-palacio-tower.description: Omotesando is also lined with famous flagship brandname stores from all over the world
aoyama-palacio-tower.jaDescription: 表参道には日本国内外の有名ブランド旗艦店が集積していることでも有名です

aoyama-palacio-tower.title: Meiji Shrine
aoyama-palacio-tower.description: Meiji Shrine boasts more visitors than any other temple during the New Year's holiday
aoyama-palacio-tower.jaDescription: 明治神宮は日本一の初詣参拝者数を誇り、神宮の杜は都民に親しまれています

yebisu-garden-place-tower.title: Westin Tokyo
yebisu-garden-place-tower.description: The Westin Tokyo is a luxury European-style hotel
yebisu-garden-place-tower.jaDescription: ウェスティンホテル東京はヨーロピアンスタイルのラグジュアリーホテルです

yebisu-garden-place-tower.title: Joël Robuchon
yebisu-garden-place-tower.description: Joël Robuchon, boasting 3 stars from Michelin, is one of the cities most prominent restaurants
yebisu-garden-place-tower.jaTitle: ジョエル・ロブション
yebisu-garden-place-tower.jaDescription: ジョエル・ロブションはミシュラン3つ星に輝く都内でも屈指の名店です

yebisu-garden-place-tower.title: Meguro River
yebisu-garden-place-tower.description: Famous for its Sakura trees, Nakameguro River is a relaxing place for walks
yebisu-garden-place-tower.jaDescription: 桜の名所として有名な目黒川は徒歩圏内です

shinjuku-nomura-building.title: Nishi Shinjuku Business District
shinjuku-nomura-building.description: Built as an urban subcenter, West Shinjuku has become Japan's largest business district
shinjuku-nomura-building.jaDescription: 新宿副都心として開発された西新宿は日本最大級のオフィス街を形成しています

shinjuku-nomura-building.title: Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building
shinjuku-nomura-building.description: The Metropolitan Government Building acts as the hub of the Toyko government
shinjuku-nomura-building.jaDescription: 東京都庁舎は丹下健三による設計で、都の行政の中枢機能を担っています

shinjuku-nomura-building.title: Shinjuku Skyscraper
shinjuku-nomura-building.description: The West Shinjuku skyline has Japan's tallest buildings. Over 30 are over 100m tall.
shinjuku-nomura-building.jaDescription: 西新宿は100m以上の超高層ビルが30棟以上ある日本最大のビル街です

shinjuku-oak-city.title: Nishi Shinjuku Business District
shinjuku-oak-city.description: Built as an urban subcenter, West Shinjuku has become Japan's largest business district
shinjuku-oak-city.jaDescription: 新宿副都心として開発された西新宿は日本最大級のオフィス街を形成しています

shinjuku-oak-city.title: Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building
shinjuku-oak-city.description: The Metropolitan Government Building acts as the hub of the Toyko government
shinjuku-oak-city.jaDescription: 東京都庁舎は丹下健三による設計で、都の行政の中枢機能を担っています

shinjuku-oak-city.title: Shinjuku Skyscraper
shinjuku-oak-city.description: The West Shinjuku skyline has Japan's tallest buildings. Over 30 are over 100m tall.
shinjuku-oak-city.jaDescription: 西新宿は100m以上の超高層ビルが30棟以上ある日本最大のビル街です

sunshine-city.title: Sunshine Aquarium
sunshine-city.description: The Sunshine Aquariam is Japan's first rooftop aquairum popular for its original events
sunshine-city.jaDescription: サンシャイン水族館は日本初の屋上水族館で趣向を凝らしたイベントが人気です

sunshine-city.title: Ikebukuro station and Seibu Ikebukuro
sunshine-city.description: Ikebukuro Station is one of the world's prolific stations boasting eight different lines
sunshine-city.jaDescription: 池袋駅は8路線が乗り入れる世界有数のターミナル駅です

sunshine-city.title: Tokyo Metropolitan Art Space
sunshine-city.description: Tokyo's Metropolitan Art Space features both classic Japanese and Western plays
sunshine-city.jaDescription: 東京芸術劇場は芸術文化振興の拠点としてクラシックや演劇が催されています

servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.title: Tokyo Big Sight
servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.description: Tokyo Big Sight is the largest convention center in Japan
servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.jaDescription: 東京国際展示場（東京ビッグサイト）は日本最大のコンベンションセンターです

servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.title: Odaiba
servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.description: Odaiba is a prominent area for shopping and is always bustling with travellers and tourists
servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.jaDescription: お台場エリアはショッピング施設が次々と開業し観光地として賑わっています

servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.title: Ariake Coliseum
servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.description: Ariake Coliseum holds the national tennis tournament every year
servcorp-tokyo-big-sight-ariake-frontier.jaDescription: 有明コロシアムはテニス競技場として有名で多くの国際大会が開催されています
